video_description:
Open to see release date + prices.

Here is a video showing the ASUS Transformer Pad Infinity TF700.
Watch in HD 1080p and enjoy.
Release is planned on 10th of June in Italy.
Asus will sell a 32GB and 64GB version with wifi only or + 3G.
The ASUS Transformer Pad Infinity TF700 will cost around €599 for 64GB version. (Without dock.)
According to my calculations the  ASUS Transformer Pad Infinity TF700 (32GB, wifi only, with dock) will cost around €650.

Link to cool looking case (made for prime) (so not sure it fits the Infinity but its just few mm difference): http://www.mobilefun.nl/34127-tuff-luv-natural-hemp-eee-pad-transformer-prime-keyboard-case.htm
Looks epic imo!

I did not made this video myself. 
All credtis go to the ASUS company
title: ASUS Transformer Pad Infinity TF700

comments.text: very﻿ sad

comments.text: The transformer infinity got approved by the FCC!﻿ Hopefully a release date will follow soon!
comments.author: demoh2o

comments.text: I first started seeing reviews of this in early january............it's now nearly june and i'm sick of waiting. I've kind of lost the excitement i had for this now. I'm basically at the point now, if﻿ this is not available in the uk within the next 4 weeks, i'm buying the new ipad.
comments.author: gabriol kirsten

comments.text:
Imo the new ipad is total waste of﻿ money compaired to this....
But its your money.
comments.author: CollinBFH

comments.text: You're right, i'll never buy an ipad. I'm just so angry at asus for making me wait so long. It's gonna be mid august until this is widely﻿ available, and thats not definate. The only thing i like about apple is that within one month of showing off their product, its available everywhere. Asus need to learn from this. The only people who wait 6 or 7 months for a product are ferrari owners.You've got to admit that this waiting time is farcical.
comments.author: gabriol kirsten

comments.text:
Patience is your friend.
Just hold on few﻿ more weeks, it will be worth it!
comments.author: CollinBFH

comments.text: I agree with gabriol. The wait is getting ridiculious. Im trying﻿ real hard to be patient
comments.author: demoh2o

comments.text: These guys are so backward!  ONE speaker?  What idiot forgot that we've had Stereo﻿ since the late 50's?  One speaker -- that's inexcusable!
comments.author: hungryjoe222

comments.text: Here's some good news for stereo lovers... there's an update video just below this one, 3:21 in length,﻿ that shows the Infinity as having Stereo speakers.  Terrific, if true.

comments.text: all the competition has cought up to appel, let the games begin!﻿

comments.text:

But as everyone else has said, don't waste your money on an iPad, trust me someone who regrettably got an iPad 2

comments.text: You said it yourself, the only people that will wait this long﻿ for a product are Ferrari owners. The Infinity is the Ferrari of the Tablet market.
comments.author: Kent Sapp

comments.text:
See this tablet looks amazing! But my biggest problem is at the moment I'm using a Sony VAIO with a bluray drive, a 1.5Tb hard drive, i7 and a very powerful NVIDIA card.... and it only cost £100 more than this device with a mobile processor...
I can't justify spending almost the same again on﻿ something so powerless compared to this laptop! Which is still quite portable!
comments.author: Craig Florence

comments.text: Where can I buy﻿ this tablet? Besides Amazon I cant seem to find it anywhere!
